attributes.comment:
The proposed new fees are fair, and so is every measure to prevent more illegal
people to decide coming to this great country. We, the citizens, don't have to pay
for the burden that immigrants constitute. Mexican women that come here to give
birth to their children, cubans that come with a visit visa, and stay here as a public
burden, central and south american gangs that acts in our streets.
Increase immigration fees, build the fence, don't allow children of illegal
immigrants be considered as american citizens, abolish cuban adjustment act.
We agree in every measure that help keep immigrants out of here.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
